title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
creator_credit: Steve Barron, Jeffrey Sneller, Raju Patel, Dieter Gessler Filmproduktions, Davis Film and Video Production and Allied Pinocchio Prod
brief_description: This classic Italian story about Gepetto the carpenter who makes a wooden boy which he can love as a son. This production has wonderful computer animated special effects as the wooden “boy” becomes flesh. For those who loved the award winning Disney production, this version of the age-old story will delight all the family. Starring Martin Landau and Jonathan Taylor Thomas.
